summary: The customer contacted Contoso Wireless Customer Service to ask if they could downgrade their service plan. The customer service agent asked for more information about the phone and the customer's desired features. After looking into the available options, the customer service agent offered the customer the Unlimited Standard Plan which includes unlimited calls and texts in the US, 5GB of high-speed data, and international calling at a discounted rate. The customer accepted the offer and the customer service agent instructed them on how to downgrade their plan.
